name: Potato and Cauliflower Cakes
author: ANTTNA
summary: We're always looking for healthy snack recipes for my son to eat at daycare instead of muffins and cakes that they give. This one is a winner.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1  jarred roasted red pepper, drained and chopped
directions: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add potatoes, cauliflower, and onion; cover and steam until tender, 10 to 15 minutes
Blend steamed vegetables, flour, Cheddar cheese, milk, eggs, mustard, garlic, salt, and pepper in a blender until batter is thick; transfer to a bowl
Spray a hinged griddle or flat griddle with cooking spray and turn heat to medium
Spoon batter, 1 to 2 tablespoons per cake, onto the hot griddle; close griddle or flip cakes and cook until lightly browned, about 4 minutes
